name: Golden Axe II
overview: Chop down the forces of evil in this intense sequel to Golden Axe. Battle the dreaded Dark Guld with the Barbarian, the Amazon and the Dwarf. Use tough new warrior skills and dazzling magic. Kick, hack, and hurl away enemies in the struggle to recapture that legendary symbol of peace, the Golden Axe. So let the battle begin! Lift your mighty blade high to crush the demon Dark Guld!
